author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
HLT: Rationalisation and reuse of cfg files for tests
Includes the HLT fixes as in #8780 plus additional ones.

Overall list of updates to the 50ns and 25ns HLT menus included in this pull request:

```
Replace HLTIterativeTracking12ForBTagDisplacedJets sequence with HLTIterativeTrackingForBTagIter12, since they are identical
Fix L1 seeds for CMSHLT-318 (50ns only), and rename a few more L1s modules
HLT paths to save muon trigger objects, CMSHLT-322
HLT paths of HIN PAG for the VdM menu, CMSHLT-279
Few prescales to adapt for 50ns menu, CMSHLT-329
Fix another bugs in HLTBtagCSVSequencePF (CMSHLT-327) and switch saveTag=true in B2G Ele+2Jets path (CMSHLT-328)
Fixed prescales (CMSHLT-310)
Fixes to CMSHLT-273 (HLT_FullTrackXX)
```

Latest master table included:

```
/dev/CMSSW_7_4_0/50nsHLT/V61
/dev/CMSSW_7_4_0/HLT/V112
```

The frozen menus correspond to the latest 50ns and 25ns GRun menus:

```
/frozen/2015/50ns_5e33/v1.2/HLT/V2: same as /dev/CMSSW_7_4_0/50nsGRun/V74
/frozen/2015/25ns_14e33/v1.2/HLT/V2: same as /dev/CMSSW_7_4_0/GRun/V41
```

The huge reduction in "numbers of lines in this PR" is due to the fact that we get rid of
half of the cfg dumps in the ../test directory, by using one dump for both real-data
and MC tests of a given menu, as opposed to two virtually identical dumps earlier!
title: HLT: Fixes and rationalisation/reuse of cfg files for tests
